project_descr: PIMS 3918 BD MSP: Support to GEF Eligible CBD Parties for carrying out 2010 Biodiversity Targets National  Assessments - Phases I and II (4NR)

outputs.output_descr: This project will provide an expedited mechanism for development, submission and approval of countries’ proposals (individual funding requests of up to $20,000 benefiting 90 countries) for their 2010 Biodiversity Targets National Assessments.
The Biodiversity Finance Initiative (BIOFIN) aims to build Transformative Policy and Financing Frameworks to Increase Investment in Biodiversity Management.
